description: Array of minimal data extraction rows for included items. Minimal, stable schema for MVP.
$comment: Appendix C models the smallest useful extraction for MVP reporting.

items.$comment: Restrict to MVP fields; extend deliberately in future iterations.

id.$comment: Stable unique identifier within Appendix C scope (e.g., 'C-0001').

screening_id.$comment: Foreign key to Appendix B 'id' (the included screening record).

key_findings.$comment: Short free-text summary of the extracted information.

extracted_at.$comment: Timestamp in ISO-8601/RFC3339. Strict format checking can be enabled post-MVP.

notes.$comment: Any additional context; must be non-empty to avoid empty placeholders.
